              </a>

             <li id="link12456696">
              <a id="link_12456696" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/resistance" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12456696,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456696});">

       <div id="wrapbox10699757">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10699757">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10699757">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10198320">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10198320">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10198320">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10198320">
          <div id="boxatt10198320" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23480739">
              <a id="link_23480739" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23480739,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23480739}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of several hundred scholarly journals covering non-English languages, literatures, and cultures. As an archive, there is typically a lag time of 3-5 years from publication until new issues appear in JSTOR. Full text journals include Chasqui, German Quarterly,  Hispamérica, Hispania, Italica, Latin American Literary Review, Monatshefte, New German Critique, Revista de crítica literaria latinoamericana,  Revista hispánica moderna, and Yale French Studies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12456735">
              <a id="link_12456735" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12456735,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456735}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23480773">
              <a id="link_23480773" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23480773,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23480773}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A full-text database specializing in journals in the humanities. Full-text journals include Cervantes,  L'Esprit créateur, French Studies, Hispania, Hispanic Review, Hispanófila,   Monatshefte, Nineteenth-Century French Studies,   Nouvelles etudes francophones, Nuevo texto crítico, Revista de estudios hispánicos, and Revista hispánica moderna.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10198321">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10198321">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10198321">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           More Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10198321">
          <div id="boxatt10198321" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12456990">
              <a id="link_12456990" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12456990,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical literature for all regions excluding the U.S. and Canada, 1450-present. Numerous links to full text. Many journals are non-English language.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12457139">
              <a id="link_12457139" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.latam-studies.com/english.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12457139,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12457139}); ">
               LatAm-Studies Full Text Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Much of the important scholarly content for Latin America comes from Latin America academic journals, yet little of it is included in the major U.S. or European scholarly indexing services. LatAm-Studies targets this content.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12457545">
              <a id="link_12457545" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=LCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12457545,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Languages, Literatures, and Cultures', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12457545}); ">
               Literature Criticism Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               All full text, this extensive archive of criticism of 20th century literary works comes from scholarly journals and books.  All articles are in English.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2910167" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Subject Guide
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63914">
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile/cannon" title="View Profile">

             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="profileh4">
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Contact Info
              </b>
              <br />
              484-664-3602
              <br />

               Send Email
              </a>
              <br />
             </div>
             <div id="profile_links" class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Links:
              </b>
